author: dependabot-preview[bot]
body:
Bumps [Microsoft.ApplicationInsights](https://github.com/Microsoft/ApplicationInsights-dotnet) from 2.10.0 to 2.11.0.
Changelog *Sourced from [Microsoft.ApplicationInsights's changelog](https://github.com/microsoft/ApplicationInsights-dotnet/blob/develop/CHANGELOG.md).* > ## Version 2.11.0 > - Upgrade to System.Diagnostics.DiagnosticSource v4.6 > - [Fix: StartOperation(Activity) does not check for Ids compatibility](https://github-redirect.dependabot.com/microsoft/ApplicationInsights-dotnet/pull/1213) > > ## Version 2.11.0-beta2 > - [Fix: Emit warning if user sets both Sampling IncludedTypes and ExcludedTypes. Excluded will take precedence.](https://github-redirect.dependabot.com/microsoft/ApplicationInsights-dotnet/issues/1166) > - [Minor perf improvement by reading Actity.Tag only if required.](https://github-redirect.dependabot.com/microsoft/ApplicationInsights-dotnet/pull/1170) > - [Fix: Channels not handling AggregateException, not logging full HttpRequestException.](https://github-redirect.dependabot.com/microsoft/ApplicationInsights-dotnet/issues/1173) > - [Metric Aggregator background thread safeguards added to never throw unhandled exception.](https://github-redirect.dependabot.com/microsoft/ApplicationInsights-dotnet/issues/1179) > - [Updated version of System.Diagnostics.DiagnosticSource to 4.6.0-preview7.19362.9. Also remove marking SDK as CLS-Compliant](https://github-redirect.dependabot.com/microsoft/ApplicationInsights-dotnet/pull/1183) > - [Enhancement: Exceptions thrown by the TelemetryConfiguration will now specify the exact name of the property that could not be parsed from a config file.](https://github-redirect.dependabot.com/microsoft/ApplicationInsights-dotnet/issues/1194) > - [Fix: ServerTelemetryChannel constructor exception when network info API throws.](https://github-redirect.dependabot.com/microsoft/ApplicationInsights-dotnet/issues/1184) > - [Make BaseSDK use W3C Trace Context based correlation by default. Set TelemetryConfiguration.EnableW3CCorrelation=false to disable this.](https://github-redirect.dependabot.com/microsoft/ApplicationInsights-dotnet/pull/1193) > - [Removed TelemetryConfiguration.EnableW3CCorrelation. Users should do Activity.DefaultIdFormat = ActivityIdFormat.Hierarchical; Activity.ForceDefaultIdFormat = true; to disable W3C Format](https://github-redirect.dependabot.com/microsoft/ApplicationInsights-dotnet/issues/1198) > - [Enable sampling based on upstream sampling decision for adaptive sampling](https://github-redirect.dependabot.com/microsoft/ApplicationInsights-dotnet/pull/1200) > - [Fix: StartOperation ignores user-provided custom Ids in scope of Activity](https://github-redirect.dependabot.com/microsoft/ApplicationInsights-dotnet/pull/1205) > - [Set tracestate if available on requests and dependencies](https://github-redirect.dependabot.com/microsoft/ApplicationInsights-dotnet/pull/1207) > > ## Version 2.11.0-beta1 > - [Performance fixes: Support Head Sampling; Remove NewGuid(); Sampling Flags; etc... ](https://github-redirect.dependabot.com/microsoft/ApplicationInsights-dotnet/pull/1158) > - [Deprecate TelemetryConfiguration.Active on .NET Core in favor of dependency injection pattern](https://github-redirect.dependabot.com/microsoft/ApplicationInsights-dotnet/pull/1152) > - [Make TrackMetric() visible. This method is not recommended unless you are sending pre-aggregated metrics.](https://github-redirect.dependabot.com/microsoft/ApplicationInsights-dotnet/pull/1149)
Commits - [`de4e53d`](https://github.com/microsoft/ApplicationInsights-dotnet/commit/de4e53d3f0f3166a5b1e6724e56706a053d221ab) Merge pull request [#1216](https://github-redirect.dependabot.com/Microsoft/ApplicationInsights-dotnet/issues/1216) from microsoft/develop - [`900fa6f`](https://github.com/microsoft/ApplicationInsights-dotnet/commit/900fa6fb74cdbca55d6d3b8029394fb06a126f12) bump version 2.11 ([#1215](https://github-redirect.dependabot.com/Microsoft/ApplicationInsights-dotnet/issues/1215)) - [`0c87e3a`](https://github.com/microsoft/ApplicationInsights-dotnet/commit/0c87e3a8a991d9ecc009b5039db4f4093534acd5) Fix StartOperation(Activity) for legacy ids ([#1213](https://github-redirect.dependabot.com/Microsoft/ApplicationInsights-dotnet/issues/1213)) - [`78dc7e3`](https://github.com/microsoft/ApplicationInsights-dotnet/commit/78dc7e3f4f9e9d9540fd53dc884f2445a3f1b4c6) Set tracestate and sampling decision even if operation id is set ([#1211](https://github-redirect.dependabot.com/Microsoft/ApplicationInsights-dotnet/issues/1211)) - [`f93523a`](https://github.com/microsoft/ApplicationInsights-dotnet/commit/f93523a4777d90b9dd20c36bcf1b35edb828216a) Merge pull request [#1210](https://github-redirect.dependabot.com/Microsoft/ApplicationInsights-dotnet/issues/1210) from microsoft/develop - [`0d8a3fe`](https://github.com/microsoft/ApplicationInsights-dotnet/commit/0d8a3fe51ac492fe58896aab7545ddae4d79c585) bump version 2.11-B2 ([#1209](https://github-redirect.dependabot.com/Microsoft/ApplicationInsights-dotnet/issues/1209)) - [`b91395e`](https://github.com/microsoft/ApplicationInsights-dotnet/commit/b91395e92038ccd34d978b646bfe898111024f99) Fix StartOperation when user provides custom Ids in scope of unrelated Activi... - [`d00d98f`](https://github.com/microsoft/ApplicationInsights-dotnet/commit/d00d98fe42aaa79dc7f763824d8c9c4962f0f781) Set tracestate if available on requests and dependencies ([#1207](https://github-redirect.dependabot.com/Microsoft/ApplicationInsights-dotnet/issues/1207)) - [`c46ebc6`](https://github.com/microsoft/ApplicationInsights-dotnet/commit/c46ebc61365f97527f79c1acf0a958b67907db28) Enable sampling based on upstream sampling decision ([#1200](https://github-redirect.dependabot.com/Microsoft/ApplicationInsights-dotnet/issues/1200)) - [`3906cb2`](https://github.com/microsoft/ApplicationInsights-dotnet/commit/3906cb25c4c2ccdfdf1bf392c2531f399cb7954c) Fix ServerTelemetryChannel constructor exception when network info API throws... - Additional commits viewable in [compare view](https://github.com/Microsoft/ApplicationInsights-dotnet/compare/2.10.0...2.11.0)

[![Dependabot compatibility score](https://api.dependabot.com/badges/compatibility_score?dependency-name=Microsoft.ApplicationInsights&package-manager=nuget&previous-version=2.10.0&new-version=2.11.0)](https://dependabot.com/compatibility-score.html?dependency-name=Microsoft.ApplicationInsights&package-manager=nuget&previous-version=2.10.0&new-version=2.11.0) Dependabot will resolve any conflicts with this PR as long as you don't alter it yourself. You can also trigger a rebase manually by commenting `@dependabot rebase`. [//]: # (dependabot-automerge-start) [//]: # (dependabot-automerge-end) ---
Dependabot commands and options
You can trigger Dependabot actions by commenting on this PR: - `@dependabot rebase` will rebase this PR - `@dependabot recreate` will recreate this PR, overwriting any edits that have been made to it - `@dependabot merge` will merge this PR after your CI passes on it - `@dependabot squash and merge` will squash and merge this PR after your CI passes on it - `@dependabot cancel merge` will cancel a previously requested merge and block automerging - `@dependabot reopen` will reopen this PR if it is closed - `@dependabot close` will close this PR and stop Dependabot recreating it. You can achieve the same result by closing it manually - `@dependabot ignore this major version` will close this PR and stop Dependabot creating any more for this major version (unless you reopen the PR or upgrade to it yourself) - `@dependabot ignore this minor version` will close this PR and stop Dependabot creating any more for this minor version (unless you reopen the PR or upgrade to it yourself) - `@dependabot ignore this dependency` will close this PR and stop Dependabot creating any more for this dependency (unless you reopen the PR or upgrade to it yourself) - `@dependabot badge me` will comment on this PR with code to add a "Dependabot enabled" badge to your readme Additionally, you can set the following in the `.dependabot/config.yml` file in this repo: - Update frequency - Automerge options (never/patch/minor, and dev/runtime dependencies) - Out-of-range updates (receive only lockfile updates, if desired) - Security updates (receive only security updates, if desired) Finally, you can contact us by mentioning @dependabot.

comments.author: msftbot[bot]
comments.body:
<!--[AutoMerge]-->
Hello @TravisEz13!

Because this pull request has the `AutoMerge` label, I will be glad to assist with helping to merge this pull request once all check-in policies pass.

Do note that I've been instructed to only help merge pull requests of this repository that have been opened for at least **24 hours**, a condition that will be fulfilled in about 5 hours 14 minutes. No worries though, I will be back when the time is right! :wink:

##### p.s. you can customize the way I help with merging this pull request, such as holding this pull request until a specific person approves. Simply @mention me (`@msftbot`) and give me an instruction to get started! Learn more [here](https://github.com/OfficeDev/office-ui-fabric-react/wiki/Advanced-auto-merge).

title: Bump Microsoft.ApplicationInsights from 2.10.0 to 2.11.0
